Posts.Content: Mar 21, 2010 06:36PM ALLISWELL wrote: Hi I am 28 years old and was diagnosed with breast cancer IDC on 1st of March, that was the worst day of my life. I have a 3year old son , i completely Â can relate myself to what you are going through. I got my right breast mastectomy done on 17th march trying to recover from surgery now, i also have my follow up tommorrow. I would just say Believe in your God, this time will also end soon, just think you have to get rid of this asap for your kid and all will be fine Good Luck with your surgery tommorrow . TC
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer @ 34 abass2010 ambyrp
